document_data.caption: A map of Mulhorand showing Murghyr near the northeast border.
document_data.name: Murghyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Murghyr''' was the capital city of the country of [[Murghôm]] during the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: Murghyr was located in western Murghôm on the east bank of the [[River Murghol]] where it joined the [[River Rauthenflow]] just south of the [[Ganathwood]] near the border of [[Mulhorand]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The [[Mulhorandi]] precept of Murghyr in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, was an esteemed [[priest]] of [[Horus-Re]] named [[Imthalos]].
